channel.title: Agents on Brighton JUG
channel.description: Recent content in Agents on Brighton JUG

item.title: The Java Agent- modifying Bytecode at runtime for fun and profit with Joseph Beeton
item.description: The Java Agent- modifying Bytecode at runtime for fun and profit with Joseph Beeton We are very excited to welcome Joseph Beeton who will be talking to us about The Java Agent: modifying Bytecode at runtime for fun and profit: Java Agents are a powerful tool to instrument or modify your application at runtime. But how do they work? In this talk I’ll be going through how they work when configured at startup as well as attaching a agent to a running process.
